snippet: A123 Systems represents the risks of the government’s battery technology program, but it represents its promise with a new technology introduced Tuesday.
abstract: A123 Systems is representative of the risks the government has embraced with their electric battery technology program, but it also represents its promise with a new technology it plans to introduce; success or failure of the new battery technology will render an early verdict on Pres Obama's push to promote electric cars and build a domestic industry to develop and make advanced batteries to run them.

byline.original: By BILL VLASIC and MATTHEW L. WALD
byline.contributor: Bill Vlasic reported from Detroit, and Matthew L. Wald from Washington.

lead_paragraph: A123 Systems represents the risks of the government’s battery technology program, but it represents its promise with a new technology introduced Tuesday.

headline.seo: A123, U.S.-Backed Battery Maker, Claims Breakthrough
headline.main: Shaky Battery Maker Claims an Advance
headline.print_headline: Shaky Battery Maker Claims a Breakthrough
